Flow.description: Manages events from Event object with the outcome to have account and contact associated to the event and Latest Visit Date and new note created with details on the event meeting itself. Modified Screen EventNote: to limit Note Title Characters from 255 to 80. LEN({!Note_Title0})<=80 (refer https://help.salesforce.com/articleView?id=000212444&type=1)

formulas.name: EventRecordSubject
formulas.expression: IF(CONTAINS({!sObjEvent_Chosen.Subject},"N4L School Visit:"),TRUE,IF(CONTAINS({!sObjEvent_Chosen.Subject},"N4L ICT Visit:"),TRUE,IF(CONTAINS({!sObjEvent_Chosen.Subject},"N4L Sign Contracts:"),TRUE,IF(CONTAINS({!sObjEvent_Chosen.Subject},"N4L Support Engineer Visit:"),TRUE,IF(CONTAINS({!sObjEvent_Chosen.Subject},"N4L Meeting:"),TRUE,FALSE)))))

Flow.label: Event Closure

fields.name: AccNameMSG
fields.fieldText: No Account is associated to this event, please search for one by entering as much of the beginning of the name as possible and specify the account type. . The next screen will provide a dropdown picklist that you can select from. Click 'Next' once done .

fields.name: EventNote_MSG
fields.fieldText: Please enter your meeting notes below. . The following will be captured as the header of your note: Subject: {!sObjEvent_Chosen.Subject} . To proceed click 'Next', alternatively refresh page or click 'Previous' to exit the process

fields.name: Event_Occured
fields.helpText: Untick if the vent did not occur or was cancelled and you would like to capture a note against the account. Note! the latest visit date will not be updated in these instances

fields.name: Note_Title0
fields.helpText: By default this concatenates the Event Subject and Date together. You are able to amend it, although recommend keeping it fairly aligned to the actual event itself

validationRule.errorMessage: The current title exceeds 80 characters. Salesforce Note, Standard Field - Title is limited to 80 characters, please amend.

fields.name: Attendee_s
fields.helpText: By default this field can only display one attendee and Event Owner automatically, you are able to add more.

fields.name: Notes_Body
fields.helpText: By default the event is description is used. This field can be amended

fields.name: NotEventOwner_MSG_1
fields.fieldText:
This event is identified as being a Stakeholder Engagement, although the subject is misaligned. Please amend the event subject to one of the following:
.
- N4L School Visit: <School Name>
- N4L ICT Visit: <ICT Name>
- N4L Sign Contracts: <School Name>
- N4L Support Engineer Visit: <School Name>
- N4L Meeting: <Organisiation/Person>
.
***If you amend and save event details, please click 'Next' to refresh this section

fields.name: Lastest_Visit_Update_MSG
fields.fieldText:
Function: updates the Latest Visit Date and captures event notes on the associated Account.

.

To proceed please click 'Next'.

.

Please note that this is exclusively for Stakeholder Engagements..

.

*** If you have amended the event details this section needs to be refreshed, please indicate this in the checkbox below and click 'Next' to refresh this section.

fields.name: Event_Details_Amended
fields.fieldText: Event Details Amended

fields.name: NotEventOwner_MSG
fields.fieldText: This event can ONLY be updated by the event creator - {!sObjEventCreator.Name} [{!sObjEventCreator.Title}] - or a Regional Director.

fields.name: NoContactMSG
fields.fieldText: No contact is associated to this event, please select one of the contacts provided in the dropdown list below. . ***Only contacts associated to the account will be presented
